name: CometStriker DX
description:
A world devouring, living space station has set its sights on your planet! Help Lt. Comet Striker on his journey to recover the Ancient Power Cores from various worlds in order to power the Planetary Defense Cannon, his world's only hope against this cosmic menace!

• Easy to learn three button combat controls allow you to shoot left or right, or use your boosters to dodge in any direction!
• 5 levels filled with branching paths for added replayability!
• Every level has a variety of new enemies and hazards to learn, as well as minibosses and bosses to fight!
• 4 difficulty levels that change level layouts and enemy behaviors for new players up to arcade veterans.
• 5 unlockable characters that all have different equipment and play-styles to the main character!
• "Labyrinth Mode" : Play procedurally created campaigns made from handcrafted rooms in this unlockable mode!
• "Challenge Mode" : Go for S-Ranks in over fifty unique bite-sized challenge levels in this unlockable mode!
• Two player local coop for all game modes!
intro: CometStriker DX is an arcade action shooter featuring dodging, strategic power-ups and intense boss fights!
